question.title: How do I resolve this issue when adding health connect dependency in android studio?
question.body:
The dependency is:

implementation("androidx.health.connect:connect-client:1.1.0-alpha11")

The error code that appears is:

Caused by: org.gradle.workers.internal.DefaultWorkerExecutor$WorkExecutionException: A failure occurred while executing com.android.build.gradle.internal.tasks.CheckAarMetadataWorkAction

I've tried updating the gradle, gradle plugin, changing the compile sdk version, and downgrading the dependency.
